extendedInfo.description: Wander around Rome with Kim.While you are visiting the characteristic places of Rome, you can try to impress her, but watch out, don't make a fool of yourself!- Answer Kim's questions correctly- Try to understand the girl's character and her tastes- Now you can go out at night or day with Kim. Look: she's really pretty with red dress!- Show off your culture to impress her- 9 appointments to conquer her- 10 different Kim's reactions - 16 different locations of the most charming places in Rome- 5 different and entertaining finalsNow you can share Roman Dating with your friends.Try "Share" on Extra menu.During the game, you can click on "menu" to suggest other answer that you would like to see as optional choices!We have inserted your "another answer" into the game: now some questions have three possible answers!This is our first app, sowe want to say a big thank you to all those that have downloaded Roman Dating and especially to those who have left comments. It means a lot to us.Your beautiful comments give us the encouragement for our next app. Stay Tuned!Tags: girlfriend, girl, love, Italy, Rome, boyfriend, boy, date, present

reviews.title: I liked it, could be better though.
reviews.comment: I like it for the setting and Kim. The dialogue isn\'t very interesting. And no matter how many times I\'ve played I only get one of two endings. I haven\'t tried to choose only wrong answers so maybe that\'s the reason.
reviews.author: Tony Rizzo

reviews.title: Decide already.
reviews.comment: If it\'s a dating sim, all the odd quizzes about Italy need to go. If it\'s an Italy trivia game, label it as such and stop wasting people\'s time. There is a whole group of people who know nothing of Italy and so are unable to enjoy this game.
reviews.author: Nicholas Shepherd

reviews.title: I love it but...
reviews.comment: How do I get her to love me? xD I always get the ending where the guy confesses, but Kim says \"I like you a lot something something\"    ---UPDATE---  I keep on getting the same ending all over again  --UPDATE-- Got a different ending after....  Randomly pressing buttons xD ---Update--- Bugs! BUGS! LOTS OF THEM! CHEATS WONT WORK!

reviews.title: Awesome, but too much trivia
reviews.comment: I finally able to conquer Kim in my 3rd effort. This game is simple but awesomely fun. I\'d love to give 5 stars but...  You gave too many trivia questions. I know that correlated with Kim\'d trait, but it just too much!  Anyway, it\'s pretty cool :)
reviews.author: Adhika Dwi Pramudita

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Translation is really bad, and there\'s not much substance.  Its mostly a trivia game about Rome rather than a dating sim.
